{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Assistant",
  "description": "Tailored Talent - Our client, fast-growing wig and beauty brand, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a reliable and organized Administrative Assistant to support its day-to-day operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Respond to DMs and customer messages across social media platforms
	Manage and update inventory records and stock levels
	Coordinate customer orders, packaging, and delivery logistics
	Track order status and keep clients informed
	Support the business owner with errands, scheduling, and vendor communication
	Maintain organized records (digital and physical)
	Escalate customer issues and provide timely follow-up.


Requirements


	Degree in a relevant field
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in an administrative/operations role
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Highly organized with strong time management abilities
	Social media savvy and confident in handling customer interactions
	Proficient in basic inventory and delivery tracking tools
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and discretion
	Interest in wigs, beauty, or fashion is a plus.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.&nbsp;",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-02",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "TailoredTalent"
    
  },

  },

  },

}



Administrative Assistant Job at Tailored Talent




        
    

        
        Tailored Talent - Our client, fast-growing wig and beauty brand, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a reliable and organized Administrative Assistant to support its day-to-day operations.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Respond to DMs and customer messages across social media platforms
	Manage and update inventory records and stock levels
	Coordinate customer orders, packaging, and delivery logistics
	Track order status and keep clients informed
	Support the business owner with errands, scheduling, and vendor communication
	Maintain organized records (digital and physical)
	Escalate customer issues and provide timely follow-up.


Requirements


	Degree in a relevant field
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in an administrative/operations role
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Highly organized with strong time management abilities
	Social media savvy and confident in handling customer interactions
	Proficient in basic inventory and delivery tracking tools
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and discretion
	Interest in wigs, beauty, or fashion is a plus.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.     

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "IT Digital Marketing Officer",
  "description": "Across Global Travel &amp; Tours Limited has been Nigeria&rsquo;s trusted travel agency for over 20 years, helping clients with visas, study abroad, work permits, tours, and flight bookings. We&rsquo;re expanding our digital presence and seeking a creative, tech-savvy individual to join our team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Digital Marketing Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Update and manage the company website (tours, visa updates, blog posts, etc.).
	Manage social media accounts: Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, LinkedIn.
	Create and schedule engaging flyers, videos, and reels for promotions.
	Upload short-form videos to TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels.
	Run paid ad campaigns on Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads.
	Monitor analytics to improve performance.
	Coordinate with the sales team to convert online leads into paying clients.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree qualification with 2 - 7 years of work experience.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 / month.&nbsp;

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;mracross007@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-17",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Across Global Travels & Tours Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Oyo",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "186712"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 75000,
      "maxValue": 150000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



IT Digital Marketing Officer Job at Across Global Travel & Tours Limited




        
    

        
        Across Global Travel & Tours Limited has been Nigeria’s trusted travel agency for over 20 years, helping clients with visas, study abroad, work permits, tours, and flight bookings. We’re expanding our digital presence and seeking a creative, tech-savvy individual to join our team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Digital Marketing Officer

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Update and manage the company website (tours, visa updates, blog posts, etc.).
	Manage social media accounts: Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, LinkedIn.
	Create and schedule engaging flyers, videos, and reels for promotions.
	Upload short-form videos to TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels.
	Run paid ad campaigns on Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads.
	Monitor analytics to improve performance.
	Coordinate with the sales team to convert online leads into paying clients.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree qualification with 2 - 7 years of work experience.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 / month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: mracross007@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
